items.sentence: She's worried because she hasn't received a letter from her son for many months.
Tom was holding a short piece of pipe in his left hand and a knife in his right.
Tom held his hand out, hoping that the man would give him a piece of candy, too.
Our tent is pretty old. I'm going to buy a new one before our next camping trip.
Instead of going out shopping, I'll make dinner using food that we already have.
